table_summary: This table provides financial metrics for various industries. It includes the number of firms in each industry, as well as key financial ratios and margins such as the price-to-sales ratio, net margin, enterprise value-to-sales ratio, and pre-tax operating margin. These metrics are useful for analyzing the financial health and valuation of firms within each industry.
